EmailTemplate.name: Alliance Reg Status Closed Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic - {!Alliance_Registration__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} Registration Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Alliance_Registration__c.Alliance_Partner_First_Name__c},
The registration for {!Alliance_Registration__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} was Closed for the following reason: {!Alliance_Registration__c.Closed_Reason__c}
If you have questions, please reach out to: sean.casey@turbobnomic.com – VP of Alliances justin.kutticherry@turbonomic.com – Alliance Manager Charles_Geisler@bmc.com – Business Development Manager
Regards, The Turbo Team
